Headline: #47 47th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 47th/Pualina
ShortDescription: Westbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Paulina.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
